title: script font with long "R" tail
content:
Anyone have idea about this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100531165857im_/http:/typophile.com/files/20081-barb_6138.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content:
The caps are from a brutally stretched [Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20100531165857/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Zapfino), the lowercase is from a mistreated English Roundhand that once might have resembled Balmoral, Shelley or Edwardian Script. What a mess!

F
It's a world-class example of what \*not\* to do with typography, ever ... really!
